```{r, echo=FALSE} 

temp_df <- sytoxG_data_no_NC[1:3400,]
ggplot(temp_df, 
       aes(x=as.numeric(time_elapsed), y=as.numeric(phenotype_value), 
           group=Compound)) +
  geom_rect(data = temp_df, aes(xmin = -Inf, xmax = Inf, ymin = -Inf, ymax = Inf, fill = delta_min_max), alpha = 0.4) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_fill_gradient2(low = "red", mid = "white", high = "red",
                       midpoint = 0, space = "rgb", na.value = "grey50", guide = "colourbar") + 
  xlab("Time Elapsed") +
  ylab("Sytox Green") +
  ggtitle("Sytox Green - Muscle Cells Over Time") +
  facet_wrap(~ Compound, ncol = 44, scales = "fixed") +
  labs(fill = "Delta\n(max-min)") +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
        strip.text=element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.length = unit(0, "cm"),
        legend.key.height = unit(.85, "cm"),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
        panel.margin = unit(.085, "cm"),
        axis.title.x = element_text(size = rel(2.5), angle = 00),
        axis.title.y = element_text(size = rel(2.5), angle = 90),
#        title = element_text(size = rel(3.5), angle = 00),
        legend.text = element_text(size = rel(2.5), angle = 00))
```
